verbs.description: He [V: is] investigating the Trump Administration 's policy of separating children from their families at the Mexican border .
[ARG0: He] is [V: investigating] [ARG1: the Trump Administration 's policy of separating children from their families at the Mexican border] .
He is investigating the Trump Administration 's policy of [V: separating] [ARG1: children] [ARG2: from their families] [ARGM-LOC: at the Mexican border] .
